        public static void copyAll(java.lang.String sourceRoot$,
                           java.lang.String targetRoot$)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Copy all files from source to target directory. Existing files will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        sourceRoot$ - the source directory
        the - targetRoot$ the targetDirectory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • copyAll

        public static void copyAll(java.lang.String sourceRoot$,
                           java.lang.String targetRoot$,
                           int mode)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Copy all files from source to target directory.
        Parameters:
        sourceRoot$ - the source directory
        targetRoot$ - the targetDirectory
        mode - one of the integer values ADD(keep existing), OVERWRITE(replace existing) or UPDATE (replace existing if newer).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
